project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that streamlines customer onboarding and provides self-service capabilities to improve customer success metrics.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials (Single Sign-On)
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in to the COSP using their existing credentials
No additional login steps required for authenticated users

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level (Tier 1, Tier 2, etc.)
acceptance_criteria: Customers see a tailored onboarding checklist based on their subscription tier
Checklist items are automatically marked as completed when the customer takes the required actions

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing within the COSP
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view all relevant product documentation within the COSP
Search results are comprehensive and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count)
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view their key usage metrics in an intuitive and interactive dashboard
Dashboard data is accurate and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily contact their CSM with pre-filled support requests
CSMs receive detailed customer information in the support ticket

integration_points: RESTful APIs for CRM, Knowledge Base, and Analytics integrations
Webhook integrations for real-time data updates
technical_architecture.data_flow: Customer data is fetched from the CRM system and used to personalize the onboarding experience. Usage data is collected from the product analytics system and displayed in the dashboard. Support requests are created by pre-populating Zendesk tickets with customer details.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict user permissions
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all data transmissions
Regularly audit and monitor the system for security vulnerabilities

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the initial set of core features to meet the minimum viable product (MVP) requirements
deliverables: Integration with identity provider, CRM, and knowledge base

implementation_phases.description: Implement the remaining features to enhance the customer experience and improve internal efficiency
deliverables: Seamless integration with Zendesk for customer support

risk_analysis.description: Complexity of integrating with multiple third-party systems (CRM, knowledge base, analytics, etc.)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Establish clear integration requirements and communication protocols with third-party vendors. Allocate sufficient time and resources for thorough testing of all integration points.

risk_analysis.description: Potential performance issues due to high user concurrency and data volume
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Design the system architecture with scalability in mind, including the use of caching, load balancing, and asynchronous processing. Conduct comprehensive performance testing during development.

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in creating a user-friendly and intuitive interface for the onboarding checklists and usage dashboards
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with user experience (UX) experts to design the interface, conduct user testing, and iterate on the design. Prioritize simplicity and ease of use in the implementation.

tools_and_technologies: AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, API Gateway)
infrastructure_needs: Scalable web hosting (e.g., AWS EC2, Kubernetes cluster)
Object storage (e.g., AWS S3) for static assets
Monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Elasticsearch, Grafana)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months of COSP launch
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the CRM system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce average customer TTV from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track feature adoption data from the usage analytics system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent by CSMs on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM activity logs and survey feedback

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data from the Zendesk integration
